Name: Save Thine Kingdom
About the game: Play as the King in a light-hearted third person action game, who is on a mission to save his kingdom from the Doombringer and his minions. With the help of your allies, journey through four unique biomes to rid your kingdom of those who wish to destroy it. Use huge a variety of weapons and hack and slash your way to victory to save your subjects.
